We acknowledge with gratitude the traditional, ancestral and unceded land of the Coast Salish peoples, including the
territories of the Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), Stó:lō and Səl̓ílwətaʔ/Selilwitulh (Tsleil-Waututh) and xʷməθkʷəy̓əm
(Musqueam) Nations, on which Monstercat's Vancouver HQ stands.

We acknowledge the unceded and ancestral territories of the Gabrielino/Tongva peoples on which our LA team live
and work.
